This is 7za utility for compression/decompression of common archive formats.

Builds for Win64 are built from this github repository:

- https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/7-Zip-zstd

Builds for macOS are built from this github repository:

- https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/p7zip-zstd

Which means it's command line 7-Zip, plus support for Zstandard compression.
